about:
Hello! I am **Phani Sai Ram Munipalli**, a Developer, Designer & an Engineer from India. Experienced Software Development Professional with 4 years of journey in IBM & Walmart. 

My contribution to technology involves Full Stack Application Development, service delivery, primarily in areas of Java 8, J2EE, Cloud Platforms & Distributed Computing Systems, Web App Development, Middleware & Microservices Architecture, React, High Performance Scalable APIs, Enterprise Integration Patterns, DevOps, Test Driven Development(TDD), and Code Security Analysis.

I love to research, design and build the technology & I write articles to share stories with people. I am passionate about the evolution of technology from centuries. My long-standing goal is to utilize contemporary technology in finding solutions to bring equality in the living conditions of people.
